block.creatingspace.rocket_controls.tool: The block that tells a rocket where to go.
block.creatingspace.rocket_generator.too: A machine that burns methane and oxygen to produce SU, start with a signal of redstone if loaded with a starter charge
block.creatingspace.catalyst_carrier.too: Allow reaction between liquid in a basin
block.creatingspace.flight_recorder.tool: shows information when the rocket doesn't work, you need engineer googles to view the information
block.creatingspace.flow_meter.tooltip.s: Show the amount of fluid passing through a pipe
block.creatingspace.oxygen_sealer.toolti: A machine that fill a room with oxygen
block.creatingspace.air_liquefier.toolti: Extract oxygen from the air and co2 from campfires, only works on earth
block.creatingspace.rocket_engineer_tabl: This table is used to craft engine blueprint.
block.creatingspace.clamps.tooltip.summa: A mean for preventing a contraption from moving, movable by pistons
block.creatingspace.cryogenic_tank.toolt: A cold liquid exclusive tank, keep it's content after breaking. Can be use in a filter
item.creatingspace.starter_charge.toolti: An explosive charge needed to start a rocket generator
item.creatingspace.design_blueprint.tool: This table is used to craft engine blueprint.
item.creatingspace.engine_blueprint.tool: Use to craft rocket engines and it's component.
